about_the_game:
We're three huge fans of Legion TD, one day, we got this wild idea to start a studio. After four months of hard work, we created Legion Defense using the 『CliCli』.

Innovative Gameplay, Upgraded Battles

Monsters and real players alternate in battle, with 29 heroes and 45 mercenaries for you to choose from. Whether you want to go all out in a head-to-head clash or sneak in for a stealthy attack, the choice is yours. Protect the king and take down the enemy to feel the ultimate thrill of strategy!

Heroes Clash, Winners Take All

Every third round, you unlock an epic 3v3 showdown! And in round 18, it’s KOF mode where players take turns battling it out, using their smarts and skills to fight for the title of the best in the arena. Get ready to feel the thrill and adrenaline of some serious combat!

Endless Roguelike, One-Handed Fun

With loads of random events and hundreds of blessings, every match feels fresh and exciting! Use your strategy to tackle whatever surprises come your way, and enjoy the fun of one-handed gameplay. Get ready for a super chill but thrilling competitive experience!

Tons of Mercenaries, Mix It Up

You’ve got 45 unique mercenaries to choose from—covering everything from front-line defenders to high-damage attackers and support roles. Adjust your lineup to make the most of their abilities and address any gaps in your strategy. Stand strong against every wave of challenges and immerse yourself in the excitement of tactical gameplay!

content_descriptors.notes: Only a small portion of female character illustrations and models expose a small part of the breasts, but no private parts are shown.
